0: Fantastic room amazing location and wonderful staff make The House build lifelong memories
The adult only venue provides a quiet relaxing atmosphere and its small size means staff are well acquainted with each guest and provide personal attention and care
a most wonderful experience from start to finish and one that is highly recommended to couples
Great vacation the staff is excellent down to earth and just genuinely happy to make your time here the best experience possible
The relaxed atmosphere makes for a perfect Caribbean holiday with no pressure to conform to stuffy dress codes yet feeling equally at home if wanting to have an elegant evening
The setting is lovely and the best part of the hotel is its quiet sophistication
Plenty of other restaurants around very good quality and the Cliff is a must do experience

Here are the places where we ate Lone Star Best restaurant decor and overall ambience food excellent toThe Tides Best tasting food in my opinion loved the seafood stew great location and ambience as well
The location and hotel are great but the staff are absolutely wonderful beautiful people they are the secret ingredient for the incredible memories you will make at The House

Nearly all of the staff took The time to engage us both professionally and personally about our trip and even about our family and truly appeared to be concerned about our experience both on the island and at the resort
1: The hotel is in need of some TLC but this is outweighed by the overall experience
We only ate at Daphnes once and found it to be nice food but lacking in atmosphere and very expensive
Most guests ate elsewhere as the ambiance the choice and quality of the menu and food are limited in Daphnes and simply not worth the money compared to other nearby restaurants

Highly recommended Restaurants Cariba Scarlet Lone Star Tides and The Cliff though the latter is by far the most expensive and frankly no better than any of the others admittedly it is a great setting

It is to be earnestly hoped that the new owners will not change this stunning property in any way or worse still make it all inclusive as it would ruin the very special ambience enjoyed by a discerning clientele
If you are looking for a non all inclusive kid free experience in a smaller hotel The House would be a very good choice
Our experience was very disappointing mainly due to inattention from the staff
That said the staff and the setting more than make up for the areas that are less than 5 star
Firstly I ’ve given it 4 stars rather than 5 as even the staff will admit it needs a bit of tlc as definitely looking shabby chic
